level.text: To fully identify the donor of a contribution, each receipt shall contain:
The donor’s occupation and principal place of business, if any;
The date of the contribution; and
Each receipt shall be handled in the following manner:
A pre-numbered receipt shall issue for each contribution received; and
Receipts shall be documented by contributor cards and copies of the donor’s check.
Records of receipts and contributions shall be maintained to show:
Cumulative totals, with the exception of receipts for sales or collections; and
For receipts for sales or collections, a detailed record of receipts and expenditures.
Each filer shall separately identify itemized receipts from unitemized receipts (for example, those receipts obtained at fundraising events).
